casebody.data:
Monday, November 15, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

98-2054. Shemo v. Mayfield Hts.

Cuyahoga App. No. 73241.

This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellees’ motion to extend time for oral argument for an additional fifteen minutes,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to extend time for oral argument be and hereby is granted to the extent that oral argument is extended to twenty minutes per side.
